Class OrdersBusinessService

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.business.OrdersBusinessService
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrdersBusinessServiceInterface
@Service public class OrdersBusinessService extends Object implements OrdersBusinessServiceInterface
Service implementation for handling business logic related to orders.
